typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as short,
		Idade as short,
		SaiuDaEmpresa as string,
		Viagens as string,
		Departamento as string,
		DistanciaDeCasa as short,
		Educacao as short,
		CampodeEstudo as string,
		Genero as string,
		NivelPosicao as short,
		Cargo as string,
		EstadoCivil as string,
		Salario as integer,
		QtdAnosExperiencia as short,
		QtdTreinamentoUltimoAno as short,
		QtdAnosNaEmpresa as short,
		QtdAnosDaUltimaPromocao as short,
		QtdAnosComMesmoGerente as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DataFuncionarios
source(output(
		EmployeeID as integer,
		EnvironmentSatisfaction as integer,
		JobSatisfaction as integer,
		WorkLifeBalance as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FuncionarioSurvey
FuncionarioSurvey select(mapColumn(
		ID = EmployeeID,
		SatisfacaoAmbiente = EnvironmentSatisfaction,
		SatisfacaoTrabalho = JobSatisfaction,
		WorkLifeBalance
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenomearColunas
DataFuncionarios, RenomearColunas join(DataFuncionarios@ID == RenomearColunas@ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinFuncionarioSurvey
